## Backup Codes

```{r}
head(penguins) # a preview of the first few rows of the penguins dataset

penguins %>% 
  count(species) # count the number of penguins by species

penguins %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% # group the analysis by species
  summarize(across(where(is.numeric), mean, na.rm = TRUE)) 
  #for each numeric column, calculate the mean excluding na values
```

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  summarize(across(where(is.numeric), mean, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
    knitr::kable(caption = "Analysis by Penguin Species")
```
